author: dblevins
msg: Fixed problems with the classpath in each of the xml
The testsuite.xml wasn't adding the Ties to the jar.  That turned out to
be the source of almost all my problems with the CORBA Server.
The javax stubs and ties are now placed in the openejb_corba-x.x.x.jar

author: dblevins
msg: No longer needed. Use OpenORB 1.2.1

author: dblevins
msg: Removed the keyGenerator HashMap, key generators are now stored in
the DeploymentInfo itself.
Applied part of Stefan's patch for key generator directories.
Added a new option in the CMP container configuration to specify the
directory where the generated KeyGenerators will go.
The value of KeyDirectory specifies where the container should put the
generated classes.

author: dblevins
msg: Added new property
private KeyGenerator keyGenerator;
The CMP container was keeping a hashtable that contained all the
KeyGenerator objects for each Deployment, indexed by deployment id.
Instead of continuously looking up the KeyGenerator for the deployment, we
now attach it to the DeploymentInfo itself and access it directly, no hashtables
and synchronization needed.

author: dblevins
msg: Added a new option in the CMP container configuration to specify the
directory where the generated KeyGenerators will go.
The value of KeyDirectory specifies where the container should put the
generated classes.
Default:
KeyDirectory   keys
Examples:
KeyDirectory   tmp/keys
KeyDirectory   ../path/to/mykeys
KeyDirectory   C:\openejb\CMPkeys
KeyDirectory   /usr/local/bin/openejb/keys
